author: Sarah Dean, CNN
title: 'I woke up and couldn't taste or smell:' A possible early sign of coronavirus
description: Doctors have reported anecdotally that losing the ability to smell may be among the coronavirus's symptoms -- but how widespread that is, and how long it might last, is unclear.
content: I'm making a thread for those who have lost their sense of smell and taste due to #COVID19 with all the things I've found helpful. It's an unnerving, miserable symptom and I know I've spent the last two weeks frantically googling it. Hope this is useful to yo… [+66 chars]
